name: openfl
description: A fast, productive library for 2D cross-platform development.

scripts.build: npm run build-lib && npm run build-dist
scripts.test: npm run build-test-es5 && npm run build-test-es6 && npm run build-test-haxe && npm run build-test-typescript && mocha-chrome test/index.html --old-and-busted
scripts.docker-build: cd scripts && node docker-run.js openfl/ci-openfl-js:0.0.2 "npm run build; chmod -R 777 dist; chmod -R 777 lib/_gen"
scripts.docker-build-dist: cd scripts && node docker-run.js openfl/ci-openfl-js:0.0.2 "npm run build-dist; chmod -R 777 dist"
scripts.docker-build-lib: cd scripts && node docker-run.js openfl/ci-openfl-js:0.0.2 "npm run build-lib; chmod -R 777 lib/_gen"
scripts.docker-build-test-es5: cd scripts && node docker-run.js openfl/ci-openfl-js:0.0.2 "npm run build-test-es5 -s; chmod -R 777 test/es5"
scripts.docker-build-test-es6: cd scripts && node docker-run.js openfl/ci-openfl-js:0.0.2 "npm run build-test-es6 -s; chmod -R 777 test/es6"
scripts.docker-build-test-haxe: cd scripts && node docker-run.js openfl/ci-openfl-js:0.0.2 "npm run build-test-haxe -s; chmod -R 777 test/haxe"
scripts.docker-build-test-typescript: cd scripts && node docker-run.js openfl/ci-openfl-js:0.0.2 "npm run build-test-typescript -s; chmod -R 777 test/typescript"
scripts.docker-test: cd scripts && node docker-run.js openfl/ci-openfl-js:0.0.2 "npm run test -s; chmod -R 777 test"
scripts.docker-test-es5: cd scripts && node docker-run.js openfl/ci-openfl-js:0.0.2 "npm run test-es5 -s"
scripts.docker-test-es6: cd scripts && node docker-run.js openfl/ci-openfl-js:0.0.2 "npm run test-es6 -s"
scripts.docker-test-haxe: cd scripts && node docker-run.js openfl/ci-openfl-js:0.0.2 "npm run test-haxe -s"
scripts.docker-test-typescript: cd scripts && node docker-run.js openfl/ci-openfl-js:0.0.2 "npm run test-typescript -s"
scripts.watch: watch 'echo "watch: Compiling..." && npm run build-lib -s && echo "watch: Compiled successfully."' ./src ./node_modules/lime/lime
